## getInternal() function

Get an internal configuration value.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function getInternal(cfgId: CfgId): bigint;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  cfgId | [CfgId](./lgpio.cfgid.md) | The configuration item ID |
